short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables saving links to a drupico account

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Drupico is a web application which allows users to organize and catalog URLs, whether they be favorite blog posts, useful reference material, sources of research, etc.
